tool_description: An API that translates number/digits less than 1 billion into Uganda's main indigenous language(Luganda)
name: N2L
title: N2L

api_list.name: convert endpoint
api_list.description: This endpoint converts the number and returns the luganda description.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://n2l.p.rapidapi.com/convert/12"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "n2l.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://n2l.p.rapidapi.com/convert/{number}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "n2l.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
